carpet.rule.endGatewaysLoadChunks.desc: End gateways load chunks when an entity teleports through them.
carpet.rule.spectatorCanUsePortals.desc: Allows spectators to teleport through Nether portals, End portals and End gateways without affecting the world.
carpet.rule.pigCannonUnstuck.desc: Fixes chunk loading behavior when player is a passenger of a very fast entity.
carpet.rule.lazyLinkingPre1_21Render.des: Returns the behavior of server sending packets with entity coordinates (MC-170907). This fixes lazy linking mob render.
carpet.rule.portalNoClipFix.desc: Fixes a bug that teleports player through a portal after touching it in a no-clip (MC-279021).
carpet.rule.commandMacro.desc: Allows to create and execute a sequence of commands with a delay.
Determines what permission level allows editing other players' macros via /macro command.
carpet.rule.playerCommandNonOperatorSpaw: Specifies in which gamemodes non-operators can spawn players with /player command.
